title: What Can You Ask Us?

features: Can you build me a domain checker like AptChecker?

How does AI predictive analytics help industrial clients?

description: Whether you're a founder, PM, or agency — we adapt to your workflow to make collaboration seamless.

description: Kickstarting a project with PixelAI is simple — we guide you through onboarding, scoping, and kickoff smoothly.

title: What your Website do?/what you can do
description: PixelAI is a team of skilled developers, designers, and AI engineers that builds smart, scalable digital products. They've created real-world solutions in industries like cybersecurity, finance, and domain management — including platforms like AptChecker (a DNS/domain tool), SafeYourWeb (a website security landing), and predictive maintenance tools for IoT analytics. They specialize in AI-driven services, chatbot integration, and full-cycle product development, and they're always open to discussing pricing, timelines, tech stacks, and use cases for your business.

title: What makes you differnt
description: As the name suggests, PixelAI blends the best of two worlds: Pixel-perfect UI design and cutting-edge AI solutions. We specialize in crafting visually stunning, highly usable interfaces tailored specifically to your business needs—while also delivering smart, AI-powered capabilities like chatbots, predictive analytics, and AI consulting. Whether you're building a product from scratch or scaling your business with intelligent tools, PixelAI ensures both beauty and brains in every solution
